languages.text: "Кровавой паутине ведома практика очищения памяти от того, что мешает служению". {n}Рот Кибеллы сжимается в жесткую линию.{/n} "Но пустоту, образующуюся на месте иссеченных воспоминаний, надо наполнять служением. Иначе ее наполнит скверна — как в твоей душе".

"The Bloodspun Web is familiar with the practice of purging one's memory of all that gets in the way of duty." {n}Kibellah presses her lips into a line.{/n} "But the void that is left in place of the excised memories must be filled with service. Otherwise, corruption will flood the soul, as it has flooded yours."
languages.original_text: "Кровавой паутине ведома практика очищения памяти от того, что мешает служению". {n}Рот Кибеллы сжимается в жесткую линию.{/n} "Но пустоту, образующуюся на месте иссеченных воспоминаний, надо наполнять служением. Иначе ее наполнит скверна — как в твоей душе".

languages.text: «La Red Sanguinolenta conoce bien la práctica de purgar el recuerdo de todo lo que interfiera con el deber». {n}Kibella aprieta los labios.{/n} «Sin embargo, el vacío dejado por los recuerdos extirpados debe llenarse con el servicio. De lo contrario, la corrupción llena el alma como ha hecho con la suya».
languages.original_text: "The Bloodspun Web is familiar with the practice of purging one's memory of all that gets in the way of duty." {n}Kibellah presses her lips into a line.{/n} "But the void that is left in place of the excised memories must be filled with service. Otherwise, corruption will flood the soul, as it has flooded yours."

traits.locale_text: «La Red Sanguinolenta conoce bien la práctica de purgar el recuerdo de todo lo que interfiera con el deber». {n}Kibella aprieta los labios.{/n} «Sin embargo, el vacío dejado por los recuerdos extirpados debe llenarse con el servicio. De lo contrario, la corrupción llena el alma como ha hecho con la suya».

languages.text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブは、任務の邪魔になるすべて記憶から消し去るという術に精通しています」{n}キベラは唇を噛んだ。{/n}「しかし、切り取られた記憶の代わりに残された空白は、奉仕によって埋められなければなりません。そうでなければ、腐敗が魂に溢れ出てしまうのです」
languages.original_text: "The Bloodspun Web is familiar with the practice of purging one's memory of all that gets in the way of duty." {n}Kibellah presses her lips into a line.{/n} "But the void that is left in place of the excised memories must be filled with service. Otherwise, corruption will flood the soul, as it has flooded yours."

traits.locale_text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブは、任務の邪魔になるすべて記憶から消し去るという術に精通しています」{n}キベラは唇を噛んだ。{/n}「しかし、切り取られた記憶の代わりに残された空白は、奉仕によって埋められなければなりません。そうでなければ、腐敗が魂に溢れ出てしまうのです」

languages.text: “所有妨碍履行职责的记忆，都必须清除干净。织血罗网对这方面的操作非常熟悉。”{n}绮贝菈紧紧抿住了嘴唇。{/n}“然而，清除记忆留下来的空白必须通过侍奉进行填补，否则腐化就会吞没那个人的灵魂，正如它已经吞没了你的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "The Bloodspun Web is familiar with the practice of purging one's memory of all that gets in the way of duty." {n}Kibellah presses her lips into a line.{/n} "But the void that is left in place of the excised memories must be filled with service. Otherwise, corruption will flood the soul, as it has flooded yours."

traits.locale_text: “所有妨碍履行职责的记忆，都必须清除干净。织血罗网对这方面的操作非常熟悉。”{n}绮贝菈紧紧抿住了嘴唇。{/n}“然而，清除记忆留下来的空白必须通过侍奉进行填补，否则腐化就会吞没那个人的灵魂，正如它已经吞没了你的灵魂。”

languages.text: "Das Blutgesponnene Netz kennt die Praxis, alles in einem Gedächtnis zu löschen, was der Pflichterfüllung im Weg steht." {n}Kibellah presst die Lippen zu einem Strich zusammen.{/n} "Aber die Leere an der Stelle der entfernten Erinnerungen muss gefüllt werden. Sonst überflutet Verderbnis die Seele, wie es bei Euch geschehen ist."
languages.original_text: "The Bloodspun Web is familiar with the practice of purging one's memory of all that gets in the way of duty." {n}Kibellah presses her lips into a line.{/n} "But the void that is left in place of the excised memories must be filled with service. Otherwise, corruption will flood the soul, as it has flooded yours."

traits.locale_text: "Das Blutgesponnene Netz kennt die Praxis, alles in einem Gedächtnis zu löschen, was der Pflichterfüllung im Weg steht." {n}Kibellah presst die Lippen zu einem Strich zusammen.{/n} "Aber die Leere an der Stelle der entfernten Erinnerungen muss gefüllt werden. Sonst überflutet Verderbnis die Seele, wie es bei Euch geschehen ist."

languages.text: « La Toile de Sang a coutume de purger la mémoire de ses fidèles de tous les souvenirs susceptibles de compromettre leur mission sacrée. {n}Kibellah pince les lèvres.{/n} Mais le vide qui succède aux réminiscences ainsi excisées doit être comblé par le devoir, sans quoi la corruption infeste l'âme, comme elle a infesté la vôtre. »
languages.original_text: "The Bloodspun Web is familiar with the practice of purging one's memory of all that gets in the way of duty." {n}Kibellah presses her lips into a line.{/n} "But the void that is left in place of the excised memories must be filled with service. Otherwise, corruption will flood the soul, as it has flooded yours."

traits.locale_text: « La Toile de Sang a coutume de purger la mémoire de ses fidèles de tous les souvenirs susceptibles de compromettre leur mission sacrée. {n}Kibellah pince les lèvres.{/n} Mais le vide qui succède aux réminiscences ainsi excisées doit être comblé par le devoir, sans quoi la corruption infeste l'âme, comme elle a infesté la vôtre. »

languages.text: "Kanipi Ağı, kişiyi vazifesine mâni olacak tüm hatıralarından arındırma uygulamasına aşinadır." {n}Kibellah, dudaklarını sımsıkı kapatıyor.{/n} "Fakat geriye kalan boşluğun ve kesilip atılan hatıraların hizmetle doldurulmasın gerekir. Aksi takdirde ruha yozlaşma akın eder. Tıpkı senin ruhuna akın ettiği gibi..."
languages.original_text: "The Bloodspun Web is familiar with the practice of purging one's memory of all that gets in the way of duty." {n}Kibellah presses her lips into a line.{/n} "But the void that is left in place of the excised memories must be filled with service. Otherwise, corruption will flood the soul, as it has flooded yours."
